_header: My fair lady so fresh of hue
_description: A Satirical Description of his Lady — twenty-one 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘When she hath on her hood of grene’

BLHar2255.First Lines:
My fayr lady so fressh of heweGood thryft come to your goodly
                    face…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…And that the Cokkow me a wakeTo looke vpon your hood of
                    green
BLHar2255.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard,
                        ed.  
             A Selection from the Minor Poems of Don John Lydgate.
Percy Society
         2. London: T. Richard, 1840: 199-205.
